== Madakkathara (627813) ==

Madakkathara is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1695 hectares and harbouring 4255 households with total population of 16850 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 9 km. Male population is 8248 and female population is 8602. Scheduled Caste Population is 1539 and Scheduled Tribes population is 34. Census Location Code of the village is 627813<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
